rule.condition: problem.status in $L.file="Suspended" and not (same(problem.status in $L.file, problem.status in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( problem.status in CurrentRecord = "Suspended" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != problem.status in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: [Send HTML Email (when ( problem.status in CurrentRecord = "Suspended" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != problem.status in SavedRecord))]

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Suspension to Assignee
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: IM.Suspension to Assignee (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Suspension to Requester
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: IM.Suspension to Requester

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Suspension to Incident Coordinator
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: IM.Suspension to Incident Coordinator (when ( assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"sendHTMLEmail","tempName":"IM.Suspension","recipient":"Set Using Javascript","js":"var $ = lib.c.$;\u000avar users = null;\u000a\u000avar assignmentGroup = record[\"assignment\"];\u000aif (assignmentGroup != null) {\u000a\u0009var assignment = $(\"assignment\").select('name=\"' + assignmentGroup + '\"')\u000a\u0009\u0009\u0009.uniqueResult();\u000a\u0009if (assignment != null && assignment[\"coordinator.incident\"] != null) {\u000a\u0009\u0009users = $.createSCArray(assignment[\"coordinator.incident\"]);\u000a\u0009}\u000a}"}
